concept.title: Scrabble Word Finder & Scoring Engine overview

conbody.p: This module generates all dictionary-valid words that can be spelled from a 7-tile rack and returns their Scrabble point values.
Audience: Developers, QA, and support teams who need to run, test, or extend the module.

ul.li: Tile rack: fixed-length array of 7 tiles.
Spellable word: a dictionary entry formable from rack letters, using each tile at most once.
Score: standard Scrabble letter values summed per word (no board multipliers).

section.title: Data dependency
section.p: The module reads its dictionary from a text file (one word per line). The current implementation expects uppercase Aâ€“Z.

ul.li: No board modeling: no premium squares, cross-words, or placement constraints.
Scores are returned without word-score pairs (scores only).
